text: 25.21 Mat 24.45-47, Luk 12.44, 16.10, 2 Ti 2.12, Hib 12.2, 1 Pi 1.8 Agek, bɨawl ne ak nop agɨnɨgab, Nad bɨ wog gɨñeb tep ak mɨdeban, yad agɨnek tek nɨŋɨd, wog gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨpan agɨnɨgab agak. Tap sɨkol okok kod mɨdtep gɨpan ak, nep agen tap awl okok kod yenɨgaban agɨnɨgab agak. Nad apɨl, yad ayɨp mɨñmɨñ yɨbɨl gɨlɨg yonɨgul agɨnɨgab agak.
